name: Walk-in interview for Junior Research Fellows (JRF)

details.Description: The Institute of Technology Management (ITM) invites applications for Junior Research Fellowships in defence-related research.
details.Eligibility Criteria: Only those candidates who have been awarded degree/provisional certificate are eligible to apply.
details.Selection Process: Walk-in-interview will be held at ITM, Mussoorie.

name: Walk-in interview for Junior Research Fellows (JRF)

details.Essential Qualification: Post graduate degree in Science with NET qualification or Graduate degree in engineering (B.E/B.Tech) in first division with valid GATE score
details.Cut-off Date: Age and Educational qualification will be considered as on the date of interview
details.Tenure: Initially for 02 years, can be upgraded and extended maximum upto period of 05 years subject to satisfactory performance
details.Reporting Time: 0930 hrs on the date of interview

name: ADVERTISEMENT FOR THE AWARD OF JUNIOR RESEARCH FELLOWSHIPS (JRF)

details.Notification Details: Applications are invited from young and motivated candidates with desired qualification for the post of Junior Research Fellow/Research Associate.
details.Contact Information: Head, Human Resource, for Director - Contact No. 03712-258508/258836 Email: hrd.dri@gov.in

name: Walk in Interview for Junior Research Fellow

details.venue: MTRDC RECEPTION, NEAR BHARAT ELECTRONICS NORTH GATE, JALAHALLI POST, BANGALORE-560013.
details.condition: Candidates must report at the venue at 10.00 hrs.
